item.title: Curriculum vitae
item.description:
Last updated: April 19, 2025

Goals & motivation

Envisioning a career change, I began studying at the 42 Prague coding institute in 2023 alongside my day job. There, I acquired a strong foundation in programming, systems thinking, and teamwork in the context of software engineering.

My growing interest in cybersecurity led me to complete two specialized courses, which I later validated by earning two industry certifications. Now, I am seeking a junior position where I can apply my skills and continue developing in the field.

item.title: Projects
item.description: In development. In the meanwhile, feel free to take a look at my GitHub.
